description: Detects wmiprvse spawning processes Author: Roberto Rodriguez @Cyb3rWard0g. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Wmiprvse Spawning Process
query: ((process.parent.executable:*\\WmiPrvSe.exe AND (NOT (LogonId:("0x3e7" OR "null") OR user.name:(NT\ AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM* OR AUTORITE\ NT\\Sys*) OR process.executable:(*\\WmiPrvSE.exe OR *\\WerFault.exe)))) AND (NOT (NOT _exists_:LogonId)))
